name: agent
description: Event Destination Map for LO Agent
content:
<EventDest>
  <!--zone_{ZONE}-->
<tkBookmark collection="dest" name="0"/>
  <Destination id="1" default="Y" stat="N" type="M" clear_cache="N" master_reset="N" max_cache_size="30000">
    <Server location="127.0.0.1" port="5530" />
  </Destination>
</EventDest>
